backend/main.mo: Defines project, template, profile, and settings types, manages storage with access control, and exposes query/update methods for profiles and filtered project retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring query client, theme, error boundary, and routing between shared, authenticated, and landing views.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/CreatorD: Main creator UI layout with responsive sidebar, preview area, timeline, mobile controls, and contextually rendered feature panels.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/SidebarN: Sidebar navigation component listing creator sections with icons and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/TopBar.t: Top bar component handling user identity, project loading, saving, and sharing with backend interactions and autosave integration.
frontend/src/features/audio/AnalysisStat: UI panel for adjusting audio analysis settings like beat detection, smoothing, sensitivity, and frequency multipliers.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioEditing: Provides trim and fade controls for loaded audio using sliders.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioUploadP: Handles uploading, drag‑and‑drop, playback, and preview of audio files with basic validation.
frontend/src/features/audio/useAudioEngi: Zustand audio engine store managing audio loading, playback, waveform generation, beat detection, and editing settings.
frontend/src/features/audio/WaveformPrev: Renders a waveform preview on a canvas using provided peak data.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Gates content behind authentication, showing login UI or children based on identity state.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupM: Modal prompting new users to enter and save a display name before proceeding.
frontend/src/features/background/Backgro: React UI panel for selecting solid, gradient, or image backgrounds and configuring particles using background settings store.
frontend/src/features/background/backgro: Canvas helpers for rendering solid, gradient, and image backgrounds based on settings.
frontend/src/features/background/particl: Animated particle overlay class that renders moving particles with adjustable density and intensity.
frontend/src/features/background/useBack: Zustand store managing background type, colors, gradients, images, particles, and serialization.
frontend/src/features/canvas/useCanvasSe: Zustand store handling canvas aspect ratios, resolutions, presets, and serialization.
frontend/src/features/errors/ErrorBounda: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and allows page refresh on errors.
frontend/src/features/export/exportEstim: Utility for estimating video file size and render time and formatting values.
frontend/src/features/export/ExportPanel: UI panel for selecting export presets, resolution, FPS, and viewing export settings.
frontend/src/features/export/exportRende: Captures canvas frames at a set FPS and returns them as byte arrays for export.
frontend/src/features/export/ffmpeg/ffmp: Placeholder FFmpeg client that simulates loading and errors because FFmpeg.wasm is unavailable.
frontend/src/features/export/useExportQu: Zustand store managing export jobs with enqueue, update, cancel, and remove operations.
frontend/src/features/gallery/CreationsT: UI panel to browse templates and creations and create projects from templates.
frontend/src/features/gallery/formatters: Utility functions for truncating principal IDs and formatting BPM values.
frontend/src/features/overlays/overlayRe: Canvas rendering helpers for text overlays, logo placement, and watermark drawing.
frontend/src/features/overlays/OverlaysC: UI panel for editing overlay text, fonts, positions, animations, and logo uploads.
frontend/src/features/overlays/useOverla: Zustand store for overlay settings with setters and serialization/deserialization.
frontend/src/features/persistence/applyL: Applies loaded project data to background, overlay, visualizer, and canvas settings.
frontend/src/features/persistence/projec: Encodes background, branding, and tunnel settings into backend-ready structures.
frontend/src/features/presets/applyPrese: Applies preset settings to visualizer, background, overlay, and particle stores with fallbacks and validation.
frontend/src/features/presets/presetsCat: Defines preset item structures and a catalog of visualizer, background, overlay, and particle presets.
frontend/src/features/presets/PresetsPar: UI panel for browsing, searching, and applying visualizer presets.
frontend/src/features/preview/PreviewCan: Renders a responsive canvas preview initialized by the visualizer engine with aspect‑ratio handling.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectsP: Provides UI for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting projects while serializing current settings on creation.
frontend/src/features/projects/useCurren: Zustand store holding the currently selected project ID with a setter.
frontend/src/features/projects/useProjec: Autosaves project settings at intervals by comparing snapshots and updating the backend when changes occur.
frontend/src/features/timeline/TimelineS: Displays a timeline with placeholder beat markers, trim range, and current playback indicator.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/B: Renders a horizontal bar equalizer with color‑mapped bars sized by audio frequency data.
Renders a vertical bar equalizer centered horizontally with bar widths driven by audio data.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/C: Draws a circular spectrum of radial bars whose lengths and colors reflect audio frequencies.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/M: Creates a soft glow circle and minimal waveform based on average audio amplitude.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/P: Renders reactive particles whose positions, sizes, and colors vary with audio intensity.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/R: Draws multiple neon radial rings populated with audio‑responsive points.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/T: Implements a WebGL tunnel effect using shaders, driven by time and audio level.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/W: Renders a simple centered waveform line across the canvas using raw audio samples.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/useVisu: React hook managing VisualizerEngine lifecycle, settings store, and audio analyser wiring.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/Visuali: UI panel for selecting visualizer modes with WebGL validation and descriptive options.
Main rendering engine managing canvas, audio analyser, visualizer modes, settings, and WebGL tunnel initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, storing identity, login flow, and persistence handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and projects via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, OKLCH theme variables, and touch-friendly UI tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorDashboard.tsx: Renders the creator dashboard behind an auth gate with profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with login, hero, and features sections.
frontend/src/pages/SharedProjectView.tsx: Loads and displays a shared project with preview, handling errors and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for replacing WaveCraft Pro with a Vizzy-style browser-based music visualizer SaaS, including required UI sections, templates system, presets library, particle behavior, and mobile issues. Lists architectural notes, known issues, and existing features to guide implementation.
